p: After ToF-SIMS analysis, the samples were thawed to room temperature and subsequently analyzed by scanning electron microscopy (SEM). Prior to SEM analysis, the skin cross section samples were coated with a 15 nm thick layer of Ag/Pd to prevent charging effects during analysis. The SEM analyses were conducted in a Zeiss Supra 40VP FEG-SEM instrument at 2 keV electron energy, 4–7 mm sample distance and using the SE2 secondary electron detector (Everhardt-Thornley type).
